body_html:
Right now, there is not a correct value for that.
However, by tomorrow morning we should have our nightlies built, and ready to use.
We should be able to pass our nightly pip package URLs to the script.

As a note, I have a bug open, and the first chance I get I will rewrite all our dockerfiles and get rid of parameterized_docker_build script.

body:
Right now, there is not a correct value for that.
However, by tomorrow morning we should have our nightlies built, and ready to use.
We should be able to pass our nightly pip package URLs to the script.

As a note, I have a bug open, and the first chance I get I will rewrite all our dockerfiles and get rid of parameterized_docker_build script.
